venue.name: Unleashed by Petco at the Bunker Hill Mall

item.description: We will be having our Frenchie Fun Day again on Saturday 2/16 from 1pm-2pm. We will be giving our guests their Valentines as well as offering free Pup Yogurt and treats. And as always our Dog Trainer John will be On Hand to ensure that safety and fun is had by all during the Indoor Playtime!! Our last Frenchie Fun Day was a blast and we look forward to Having you all back again! This event is FREE as are all of our events.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Frenchie Fun Day at Unleashed Charlestown!
